personalInfo.name: Prateek Jain
personalInfo.title: Senior Web Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Hi there, I'm Prateek a **Senior Web Engineer**, designer, and (apparently) the entire engineering department behind **Hookflo.com**. I build scalable, high-performance web apps with modern tech and interfaces that actually make sense.
